property.name: navLabel
property.label: Navigation Label
property.description: Label of the Navigation Menu to be displayed.

property.name: displayMode
property.label: Display Mode
property.description: Display mode for the Navigation Menu

property.name: currentTab
property.label: Current Tab label
property.description: When in tabs display mode, label of the currently selected tab.

property.name: titlePrefix
property.label: Link Title Prefix
property.description: When using links, prefix added to teh link label for the title.

property.name: showHome

property.description: Display Home link of Navigation menu.

property.name: wrapperClass
property.label: Wrapping Class
property.description: CSS to apply on the wrapping component (e.g. for padding around links)

property.name: listClass
property.label: List Class
property.description: CSS to apply on the ul or ol container when list mode is used
